snippet.title: Baldi's Basics Classic Remastered - Release Date Trailer [OFFICIAL]
snippet.description:
Baldi's Basics Classic Remastered is AVAILABLE NOW!

Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1712830/Baldis_Basics_Classic_Remastered/
Itch.io: https://basically-games.itch.io/baldis-basics-classic-remastered
Game Jolt: https://gamejolt.com/games/baldis-basics-classic-remastered/602328

To coincide with the launch of Baldi's Basics Classic Remastered, Baldi's Basics Plus is 25% off on all storefronts until November 4!
Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1275890/Baldis_Basics_Plus/
Itch.io: https://basically-games.itch.io/baldis-basics-plus
Game Jolt: https://gamejolt.com/games/baldis-basics-plus/481026

Use code "REMASTER20" to get 20% off your entire order from the Basically Games Merch Store! Valid until November 6! https://basically-games-merch-store.creator-spring.com/

Escape Baldi's schoolhouse again in this new remastered version of Baldi's Basics Classic! Featuring three games in one, gameplay improvements, a more authentic art style, accessibility improvements, and brand new ways to play! Whether you've played the original or this is your first time, you'll surely have a blast!
